trans-unit.source: Defines common functionality for a cell that allows the manipulation of its value.
trans-unit.target: Definerer felles funksjonalitet for en celle som tillater manipulering av verdien.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> and provide a user interface (UI) for specifying values without hosting an editing control.
trans-unit.target: Dette grensesnittet implementeres av klasser som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>som avledes fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>og angi brukergrensesnittet (UI) for å angi verdier uten å være vert for en kontroll for redigering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: The UI in this case is displayed regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Brukergrensesnittet vises i dette tilfellet uansett om cellen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Other cell types, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, provide a UI but do not store user-specified values.
trans-unit.target: Annen celle datatyper, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, gir et brukergrensesnitt, men ikke lagre brukerangitte verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the cell type does not implement IDataGridViewEditingCell or host an editing control.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet typen cellen ikke implementere IDataGridViewEditingCell eller være vert for en kontroll for redigering.

trans-unit.source: Cell types that display an editing control when the cell is in edit mode, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>, do not implement IDataGridViewEditingCell but instead provide a companion class that implements <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>.
trans-unit.target: Cellen typer som viser en kontroll for redigering av Hvis cellen i redigeringsmodus, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>, ikke implementere IDataGridViewEditingCell, men angi i stedet en hjelpefilen klassen som implementerer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> provides a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl> that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control and implements <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>gir en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl>som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontrollere og implementerer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> property is set to a <xref:System.Type> object representing the editing control type.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>er satt til en <xref:System.Type>-objekt som representerer redigering kontrolltypen.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about implementing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>, see [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om implementering av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>, se [slik: vert styrer i Windows Forms DataGridView celler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formatted value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den formaterte verdien i cellen.

trans-unit.source: The formatted value represents the value as it is displayed in the cell's user interface.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er formatert representerer verdien som de vises i brukergrensesnittet for den cellen.

trans-unit.source: The formatted value may be different in absolute value and even data type than the actual value contained in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er formatert kan være forskjellig absoluttverdien og selv datatype enn den faktiske verdien i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this property typically return a value retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell.GetEditingCellFormattedValue%2A> method and passing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: Implementeringer av denne egenskapen vanligvis returnere en verdi som hentes ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell.GetEditingCellFormattedValue%2A>metoden og sende i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell.GetEditingCellFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the cell's value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder celleverdien.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of the cell has changed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om verdien i cellen er endret.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to `true` to indicate that the cell value has been modified and that its user interface (UI) may need to be updated to reflect this change in value.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er satt til `true` å angi at celleverdien er endret, og at brukergrensesnittet (UI) må kanskje oppdateres for å gjenspeile denne endringen i verdien.

trans-unit.source: The owning cell or table should reset this property to `false` after an update.
trans-unit.target: Eier cellen eller tabellen må tilbakestille denne egenskapen til `false` etter en oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the cell has changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdien i cellen er endret. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter den formaterte verdien i cellen.

trans-unit.source: The formatted value represents the value as it is displayed in the cell's user interface.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er formatert representerer verdien som de vises i brukergrensesnittet for den cellen.

trans-unit.source: The formatted value may be different in absolute value and even data type than the actual value contained in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er formatert kan være forskjellig absoluttverdien og selv datatype enn den faktiske verdien i cellen.

trans-unit.source: To set the formatted value of the cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell.EditingCellFormattedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi den formaterte verdien i cellen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell.EditingCellFormattedValue%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell.EditingCellFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that specifies the context in which the data is needed.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> verdier som angir konteksten som kreves for dataene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the formatted version of the cell contents.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer formaterte versjonen av celleinnholdet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the currently selected cell for editing
trans-unit.target: Forbereder den valgte cellen for redigering

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is to prepare the cell and its contents for editing.
trans-unit.target: Formålet med denne metoden er ikke forberede cellen og innholdet for redigering.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to put the insertion point at the end of the cell contents, or change how the contents are aligned.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel sette pekeren på slutten av celleinnholdet, eller endre hvor innholdet er justert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the cell contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>velge celleinnholdet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
